name: moo
actor_no_arg: You chew your cud and moo plaintively.  Muh-OOOOO!
others_no_arg: $n turns cowlike eyes on you, chews $s cud, and moos plaintively.
actor_found_target: You focus all your bovine Zen on $N, and speak your thoughts.  Muh-OOOOO!
others_found: Slowly, $n looks at $N, chews $s cud, and muh-OOOOs!
target_found: $n moos at you.  What could that possibly mean?
actor_auto: You'd better find someone else to moo at.
others_auto: $n is mooing at $mself again...  You look for an exit...
